title: Auras - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/3/19
itunes:title: Auras - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/3/19
description:
George Noory and color intuitive Dougall Fraser discuss his work as a spiritual teacher who studies the colors of people's auras, and how the colors can change and improve specific aspects of your life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: An examination into the connection of a soul's energy to different colors.
